LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Letter_Title: You have assimilated into the ranks of {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Requrements_Not_Satisf: You need to have minimum of 10 goodwill, currently you have only {0} goodwill.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Menu_Missions_Desc: While wondering around camp, you ask if any of the other legionaries have heard of any tasks.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Salary_Desc: You are graciously rewarded a tithe from this faction every 14 days.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Provisions_Desc:
Marius' Mules will give your caravan inventory the following every 10 days:

- 6 Legion Food Bags 
- ×3 Legion Weapon Caches
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Provisions_Desc_Standard_Issu:
Legion standard Issue gear will arrive via your caravan inventory every 30 days:

- ×2 Legion Weapon Caches 
- ×2 Legionaries Uniform Bag
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Storage_Desc: Store items from your caravan to your faction stash. Faction stashes transfer across all of the faction's outposts and will save contents even if you are no longer enlisted.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Part_Time_Job_Desc: Pull extra duties and cover shifts for your battle buddies for $12 an hour.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Camp_Healer_Desc: Check in with the camp healer of this base. This service tends to all of your Legionaries with industrial medicine. Immunity gain is also increased while your Legionaries are in the camp healers care.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Melee_Training_Desc:
Train your Legionaries with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Melee

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Survival_Training_Desc:
Train your Legionaries with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Animals
- Construction
- Cooking
- Crafting
- Mining
- Plants

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Turn_In_Desc: Turn in suspected slaves and profligates to Legion slave facilities.\n\n -Turning over any hostile pawns do not result in a slavery debuff-
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Resign_Menu_Text: You will abandon the ways of the Legion effective immediately. (-25 in relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Resign_Button_Label: You have successfully abandoned the Legion. (-25 relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlisted_To_Hostile_Faction: cannot join because you are enlisted with their enemy, {HOSTILEFACTION_name}
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Kick_Out_Label_Title: The Caesar has marked you for death, and the Legion obeys! You are kicked out of the Legion.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Reinforcements_Button_Desc: Call for reinforcements from your faction. Amount of Legionaries they send depends on your current relations.
